snippet: Prosecutors have now pressed piracy charges against the entire crew of a Greenpeace International ship, including the captain; the ship’s cook and doctor; and two freelance journalists.
abstract: Russian prosecutors are pressing charges of piracy against entire crew of Greenpeace International ship the Arctic Sunrise; authorities seized vessel in September during protest in which crew members scaled sides of Russian oil platform in Arctic.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors have now pressed piracy charges against the entire crew of a Greenpeace International ship, including the captain; the ship’s cook and doctor; and two freelance journalists.
